name: Carve your Initials
desc: Normal damage and target suffers from humiliation and may only attack you (Will negates)

name: Missing Digits
desc: Normal damage and target loses 1d3 fingers and takes 1 Con and Str drain (Fort negates)

name: Hack and Slash
desc: Double damage and all critical threats against target automatically confirm for the next 3 rounds

name: Stand Aside
desc: Double damage and push target 1 square in any direction

name: Severed Tendon
desc: Normal damage and 1d6 Dex damage

name: Decapitation
desc: Double damage and death (Fort negates)

name: Bewildering Display
desc: Double damage and target takes a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds

name: Long Gash
desc: Normal damage and 8 bleed. A successful Heal check cuts the bleeding in half, rather than ending it

name: Shattered Jaw
desc: Normal damage and 1 Con damage. Target cannot speak or bite until healed

name: Hamstring
desc: Normal damage and 1d2 Dex damage and target is knocked prone

name: Brow to Chin
desc: Normal damage and 1 Con and Cha damage. -2 penalty on Spot, 1 Search and ranged attacks until healed

name: Gut Slash
desc: Double damage and 1d4 bleed. Target cannot swallow whole

name: Wing Tear
desc: Double damage and target loses flight if it uses wings

name: Missing Ear
desc: Normal damage and 1 Cha drain. -4 penalty on Listen check until healed

name: Wide Open
desc: Normal damage and target provokes attacks of opportunity from all threatening opponents

name: We've Got a Bleeder
desc: Normal damage and 2d6 bleed

name: Throat Slash
desc: Normal damage and 2d6 bleed. Target cannot talk or breathe while bleeding

name: Parrying Strike
desc: Double damage and +4 to your AC for 1 round

name: Lean into the Blow
desc: Triple damage, but you drop your weapon

name: Flay
desc: Normal damage plus 1d6 Str damage

name: Paper Cut
desc: Normal damage and -4 penalty on attack rolls, skill checks and ability checks for 1d4 rounds

name: Severed Hand
desc: Normal damage and target loses hand and takes 1d3 Con and Str drain (Fort negates)

name: Flat Blade Thwack
desc: Triple damage but all damage is nonlethal

name: Surprise Opening
desc: Double damage and one free attack against the target with a -5 penalty

name: Broad Swipe
desc: Normal damage and 1d8 bleed

name: Disembowel
desc: Double damage and 1d4 Con damage and 1d6 bleed

name: Sapping Slash
desc: Double damage and target is fatigued

name: Rupture Abdominal Cavity
desc: Double damage and 1 Con bleed

name: Muscle Wound
desc: Double damage and 1d2 Str damage

name: Fingertipped
desc: Normal damage and 1 Dex damage. Target cannot use one hand until healed

name: Bad Parry
desc: Double damage and target is disarmed (1 item)

name: Nerve Slice
desc: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round

name: Weapon Strike
desc: Double damage and normal damage to target's weapon

name: Tangled
desc: Double damage and you may automatically grapple the target

name: Momentum
desc: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round

name: Lip Cut
desc: Double damage and 1 bleed. Target gains 20% spell failure chance for verbal spells until healed

name: Gory
desc: Normal damage and target is sickened for 1d6 rounds

name: Across the Eyes
desc: Normal damage and target permanently blinded (Ref negates)

name: Ugly Wound
desc: Normal damage and 1d3 Cha damage and 1 Cha drain (Fort negates drain)

name: Knockback
desc: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away

name: Pain and Simple
desc: Double damage and 2d6 nonlethal damage

name: Cut Straps
desc: Double damage and double armor check penalty until fixed (DC 15 Craft)

name: Severed Spine
desc: Double damage and 3d6 Dex damage (Fort halves)

name: Overhand Chop
desc: Double damage and 1d4 bleed

name: Delayed Wound
desc: Normal damage and target takes bleed damage equal to your normal damage

name: Brow Cut
desc: Normal damage and 1d4 bleed. Target blinded while bleeding

name: Leg Swipe
desc: Double damage and target is knocked prone

name: Terrible Gash
desc: Double damage and 1 Cha drain

name: Shield Cleave
desc: Double damage and normal damage to target's shield

name: Armor Damage
desc: Double damage and normal damage to target's armor

name: Swing Through
desc: Double damage and one free attack against an adjacent foe at the same bonus

name: Spun Around
desc: Normal damage and target is flat-footed for 1 round
